column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I always thought deep dish would be thick dough. I have had Chicago pizza before at Giordanos and was not impressed. Malnati's pizza is layer after layer of cheese
column3: pepperoni (or sausage) then cheese again and so on. Never ending. When you bite into it
column4: the cheese oozes along with the sauce perfectly. And the smell? heaven!
